DOC.brief_title: Single Port Versus Four Ports Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy Early Postoperative Pain
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize , two-arm , double-blinded three-center trial compare single-port transumbilical laparoscopic cholecystectomy conventional 4-port laparoscopic cholecystectomy . 120 patient include 1:1 randomization . Three center participate trial . Inclusion criterion : Female patient , ASA I-III , age 18 75 year , elective laparoscopic cholecystectomy biliary pain recent uncomplicated biliary pancreatitis . Exclusion criterion : Expected poor compliance , history cholecystitis severe pancreatitis , previous open upper abdominal surgery , pregnancy lactation , preoperative chronic pain conversion laparoscopic open surgery . Pain nausea measure VAS operation 3 hr , 1 day , 2 day 3 day operation . Cosmesis evaluate 28 day . Patients telephone-interviewed 12 month ask port hernia formation . If hernia suspect patient call abdominal ultrasonography .
